changes.title: New Features
changes.text:
[EN-4070] - Static Batching implementation
[EN-4099] - Optimise Particles prewarm
[EN-4107] - Add animations optimisation tool
[EN-4129] - Return AntiAliasing option to UPP window
[EN-4131] - Dynamic Batching improvement - pack objects in different order

changes.title: Fixes and Improvements
changes.text:
[EN-4101] - Fix BIRP Shadows artifacts with Transparent Objects
[EN-4122] - Fix Shadow Frustum Scale calculations
[EN-4145] - Fix pixelated shadows
[EN-4163] - Fix URP Shadows issues
[EN-4134] - Fix false cache on Plugin installation
[EN-4166] - Fix shader not being added for compilation
[EN-4193] - Fix - compiling shader variant progress bar always show zero progress
[EN-4149] - Cancel build on shader variant compilation cancellation
[EN-4128] - [Ironsource] Fix - multiply tapping on mute button freeze the gameplay
[EN-4137] - [BigaBid network] Change format to a single file
[EN-4138] - [Meta platform] Fix inline build
[EN-4157] - Fix Meta inline being ZIP archive
[EN-4124] - Fix DontDestroyOnLoad behaviour
[EN-4125] - [Spine] Fix C# type for native initialisation
[EN-4127] - Particles Stretched Billboard fix
[EN-4130] - Baked lightmaps fix
[EN-4139] - [Animator] Fix accuracy errors for edge cases with ExitTime ==
/1
[EN-4147] - Fix Skybox Environment Reflections
[EN-4151] - Fix transparency issue on TMP UGUI
[EN-4114] - Clean up PHC warnings list
